attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to see the Theory Test Scrapped After all we are already 
going to be testing on our driving Skills With a Driving Test 

and alot of people fail Theory Tests due to the Hazard Perception Part 
which is failing about 79% of people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
